1.title: Canada: Dinosaurs

episode of.title: Are We There Yet?: World Adventure (TV Series 2007– )

1.plot: Charlie and Gabe explore Dinosaur Valley in Alberta, the dinosaur capital of the world! The duo discover a real fossil, help out on an actual dinosaur dig and visit The Royal Tyrrell Museum.

2.title: Canada: Totem Poles

episode of.title: Are We There Yet?: World Adventure (TV Series 2007– )

2.plot: Hillary and Emily take a ferryboat ride to the West coast of Canada to learn about Totem Poles. On their journey, the sisters learn how to read a Totem Pole, perform a First Nations welcoming dance and ride a giant cedar canoe.

3.title: Canada: Whales

episode of.title: Are We There Yet?: World Adventure (TV Series 2007– )

3.plot: Jake and Jessica are going whale watching! They start their adventure at an aquarium where they meet some underwater creatures before speeding out on a fast zodiac to see Killer Whales leaping out of the water.

4.title: Canada: Lighthouse

episode of.title: Are We There Yet?: World Adventure (TV Series 2007– )

4.plot: Jake and Jessica travel to British Columbia to celebrate the 150th birthday of a lighthouse. They visit a fort, see an air show and climb to the top of the lighthouse. At the end of the day, they stay up late for a giant fireworks display.

5.title: Ecuador: Cloud Forrest

episode of.title: Are We There Yet?: World Adventure (TV Series 2007– )

5.plot: Charlie and Gabe visit the Cloud Forest in Ecuador where they gather giant leaves to feed some very hungry caterpillars. The brothers also get to hold butterflies, make a cup out of bamboo and go tubing down a fast river.

6.title: Ecuador: Quito

episode of.title: Are We There Yet?: World Adventure (TV Series 2007– )

6.plot: Charlie and Gabe visit the Botanical Gardens in Ecuador where they try all sorts of different fruits. They play games with local kids and have a go-kart race before visiting the Equator.

7.title: Ecuador: Village

episode of.title: Are We There Yet?: World Adventure (TV Series 2007– )

7.plot: Charlie and Gabe visit a native tribe in Ecuador. They make crowns out of leaves, blow darts into a papaya, meet a very friendly monkey and then are invited to dance with the tribe.

8.title: Brazil: Pink Dolphins

episode of.title: Are We There Yet?: World Adventure (TV Series 2007– )

8.plot: Jessica and Jake travel to meet the Desana tribe of the Amazon and watch a ceremonial dance. They take a boat ride along the Amazon to swim with one of the Amazon's most amazing creatures- the Pink Dolphin.

9.title: Brazil: Tree Climbing

episode of.title: Are We There Yet?: World Adventure (TV Series 2007– )

9.plot: Climbing out of their tree house hotel, Jessica and Jake meet some monkeys. They head off into the Amazon and see acai berries harvested from trees, meet some big bugs, and then get to climb up a tall tree and swing like monkeys.

10.title: Brazil: Statue

episode of.title: Are We There Yet?: World Adventure (TV Series 2007– )

10.plot: Jessica and Jake head up to Sugar Loaf Mountain and spot a famous statue named Christ the Redeemer, which they go visit. They make a sugary Brazilian treat with a local chef and top the day off with a helicopter ride over Rio de Janeiro.

11.title: Brazil: Beach

episode of.title: Are We There Yet?: World Adventure (TV Series 2007– )

11.plot: Jessica and Jake play foot volley on a beach in Rio de Janeiro. They meet an artist friend, add a tile to his giant mosaic and then learn some capoeira - a Brazilian martial art. They race back to the beach to boogie board in the waves.

12.title: USA: NASA

episode of.title: Are We There Yet?: World Adventure (TV Series 2007– )

12.plot: Jessica and Jake blast off to the Kennedy Space Center. They make some space food, dress up in space suits and do some astronaut training including a round in the multi-access trainer. To cap off their day the pair go indoor skydiving.

13.title: USA: Alligators

episode of.title: Are We There Yet?: World Adventure (TV Series 2007– )

13.plot: In the Florida Everglades, Jessica and Jake ride an air boat - a boat propelled by a giant fan - and spot a mother gator and her babies. Wanting to know more, they head off to Gatorland and meet all sorts of other Florida gators.

14.title: USA: Manatees

episode of.title: Are We There Yet?: World Adventure (TV Series 2007– )

14.plot: Jessica and Jake's friend at Sea World introduces them to a baby manatee, and some rescued sea turtles. They head to the coast of Florida and go kayaking to meet some manatees up close.

15.title: Hungary: Palace

episode of.title: Are We There Yet?: World Adventure (TV Series 2007– )

15.plot: Hilary and Emily visit the Buda Castle in Hungary. They dress up like queens, are treated to an imaginary coronation, and meet a golden eagle! They take a boat down the Danube River to see the crown jewels of Hungary at the Parliament.

16.title: Hungary: Medieval

episode of.title: Are We There Yet?: World Adventure (TV Series 2007– )

16.plot: Hilary and Emily visit a Medieval Renaissance village where they get to dress up in medieval clothing. They how to make special cookies with mirrors inside, see a bird show, do archery and make a wooden spinning top with the town carpenter!

17.title: Hungary: Market

episode of.title: Are We There Yet?: World Adventure (TV Series 2007– )

17.plot: Hilary and Emily visit a traditional Hungarian market where they get to help make some handicrafts and then get to act out a story with puppets. They meet some baby egret birds at a sanctuary and even help to release an adult bird.

18.title: Hungary: Horses

episode of.title: Are We There Yet?: World Adventure (TV Series 2007– )

18.plot: Hilary and Emily meet a Hungarian hat maker who takes some wool and makes it into a hat! They meet some Hungarian cowboys who show them tricks, and take the girls for a horseback ride. They end their day by making a special cowboy stew.

19.title: Israel: Sukkot

episode of.title: Are We There Yet?: World Adventure (TV Series 2007– )

19.plot: Charlie and Gabe get invited to spend the festival of Sukkot with their friends in Israel. They get supplies at the market, and return back to build and decorate a small hut. The boys celebrate by eating some candy with their new friends.

20.title: Israel: Dead Sea

episode of.title: Are We There Yet?: World Adventure (TV Series 2007– )

20.plot: Emily and Hilary go on a camel ride through the Israeli Desert. They find some cute animals gathered around a freshwater desert oasis. Finally they venture to the Dead Sea where they float in the salty water and cover themselves in mud.

21.title: Israel: Masada

episode of.title: Are We There Yet?: World Adventure (TV Series 2007– )

21.plot: Emily and Hilary see a replica of the Masada fort. They get to roll cannonballs, play with slingshots and yell out echoes in the mountains. To cap off their day they take a Cessna flight over Masada and the Dead Sea.

22.title: Israel: Olives

episode of.title: Are We There Yet?: World Adventure (TV Series 2007– )

22.plot: Charlie and Gabe harvest olives and put them in an ancient olive press to make olive oil! They head to a special spot in Jerusalem called the Mount of Olives, where they take a camel and a donkey ride.

23.title: Jordan: Chariot Race

episode of.title: Are We There Yet?: World Adventure (TV Series 2007– )

23.plot: Aamil and Rehan explore the ancient Roman city of Jerash, where they are invited to get dressed in armor, don swords and race one another in a chariot race through the Hippodrome.

24.title: Jordan: Petra

episode of.title: Are We There Yet?: World Adventure (TV Series 2007– )

24.plot: Aamil and Rehan visit the Treasury building in Petra- one of the new world wonders! They ride a camel, play a game and finish their adventure by finding a cave and testing their echo skills.

25.title: Jordan: Desert

episode of.title: Are We There Yet?: World Adventure (TV Series 2007– )

25.plot: Aamil and Rehan climb into a micro-light mini plane and soar over the rolling red sand dunes and mountains. After, they visit a desert camp where they dance, try sand boarding and take a camel caravan into the open desert.

26.title: UAE: Camel Race

episode of.title: Are We There Yet?: World Adventure (TV Series 2007– )

26.plot: Hilary and Emily explore the desert of the UAE, which is full of camels! The duo visit a camel race, go to a camel market, ride a camel, milk a camel and cap off their day by trying some delicious camel milk chocolate.

27.title: UAE: Tallest Building

episode of.title: Are We There Yet?: World Adventure (TV Series 2007– )

27.plot: Hillary and Emily visit the top of the tallest building in the world. They explore Dubai's many other wonders such as indoor skiing, a giant aquarium at the world's largest mall, and rolling down a hill in a giant ball.

28.title: UAE: Arabian Animals

episode of.title: Are We There Yet?: World Adventure (TV Series 2007– )

28.plot: Hillary and Emily ride on dune buggies in the Arabian Desert. They see all sorts of indigenous animals, take turns bottle-feeding baby antelope, cuddle with a baby white lion and make a beautiful silk painting of an Arabian animal.

29.title: Japan: Sumo Wrestling

episode of.title: Are We There Yet?: World Adventure (TV Series 2007– )

29.plot: Rehan and Aamil visit a sumo club in Japan where they learn the basics of wrestling. They get dressed up, have a sumo match, make a sumo wrestler autograph at Senso-Ji Temple in Tokyo and then eat some chanko, a stew for sumo wrestlers.

30.title: Japan: Robots

episode of.title: Are We There Yet?: World Adventure (TV Series 2007– )

30.plot: Rehan and Aamil head to Tokyo to learn how to make their own robot. They test out their robots in a robot playground, eat a robot treat from a vending machine, and cap off their day by meeting one of Japan's most famous robots.

31.title: Japan: Snow Monkeys

episode of.title: Are We There Yet?: World Adventure (TV Series 2007– )

31.plot: In Nagano's mountains, Aamil and Rehan discover an interesting furry creature- a snow monkey! The duo meet snow monkeys in the wild, learn how to make a sushi snack, and then make a snow monkey out of origami.

32.title: Japan: Ninja

episode of.title: Are We There Yet?: World Adventure (TV Series 2007– )

32.plot: In the woods of Japan, Rehan and Aamil show up for ninja training school. They dress up in ninja outfits and learn ninja tricks like star throwing, horizontal wall climbing and invisibility power- all with a real ninja.

33.title: Canada: Snowmobiling

episode of.title: Are We There Yet?: World Adventure (TV Series 2007– )

33.plot: Charlie and Gabe jump on some snowmobiles and snowshoe to a giant groundhog sculpture. They learn about Groundhog Day, bring Willie the groundhog to the vet, make groundhog shaped maple fudge and see the groundhog make his prediction.

34.title: Antigua and Barbuda: Music

episode of.title: Are We There Yet?: World Adventure (TV Series 2007– )

34.plot: Rehan and Aamil meet a friend who teaches them about Moko Jumbie stilt walking. After the boys are done stilt walking they try playing the steel pan drum, make a shak shak instrument and try a special Antiguan desert- sugar cake.

35.title: Antigua and Barbuda: Pirates

episode of.title: Are We There Yet?: World Adventure (TV Series 2007– )

35.plot: Rehan and Aamil unearth a treasure map, which they follow around the island. They discover all sorts of Antiguan treasures like black pineapple, and eventually find a pirate ship and a pirate who takes them to find a hidden treasure.

36.title: Antigua and Barbuda: Stingrays

episode of.title: Are We There Yet?: World Adventure (TV Series 2007– )

36.plot: Rehan and Aamil meet a friend who teaches them to sail. Together they work to sail over to an island and meet the local wildlife before sailing off to a stingray colony where they get to hold and feed stingrays.

37.title: Mongolia: Eagles

episode of.title: Are We There Yet?: World Adventure (TV Series 2007– )

37.plot: Jessica and Jake visit an Eagle Festival where they see Mongolian horseman use eagles to catch things. They dress up in Mongolian costumes, hold a real eagle and learn how to use a bow and arrow.

38.title: Mongolia: Camels

episode of.title: Are We There Yet?: World Adventure (TV Series 2007– )

38.plot: Jake and Jessica wake up in a special Mongolian hut called a Ger in the middle of the Gobi Desert and meet a friend who takes them to a special camel festival.

39.title: Mongolia: Throat Singing

episode of.title: Are We There Yet?: World Adventure (TV Series 2007– )

39.plot: Jessica and Jake's friend takes them to an old Buddhist monastery where they get to see the world's tallest indoor statue of Buddha. They do some traditional Mongolian dancing, and best of all, throat sing.

1.title: Mexico: Pyramid

episode of.title: Are We There Yet?: World Adventure (TV Series 2007– )

1.plot: Sam and Molly discover an ancient Maya pyramid at Chichen Itza and witness an exciting match of the ancient sport, poc tu poc.

2.title: Mexico: Mexican Town

episode of.title: Are We There Yet?: World Adventure (TV Series 2007– )

2.plot: It's a jam-packed day in a small Mexican town as Molly and Sam meet local musicians, learn how to finger paint, taste tamales and break open a piñata.

3.title: Mexico: Animals

episode of.title: Are We There Yet?: World Adventure (TV Series 2007– )

3.plot: It's a sunny, hot day in Mexico as Molly and Sam feed a baby manatee, meet sun-loving lizards and go swimming with singing, dancing, clapping dolphins.

4.title: England: Animal Park

episode of.title: Are We There Yet?: World Adventure (TV Series 2007– )

4.plot: Julian and Rosie journey to England's 1000-year old New Forest. There they befriend animals like Rusty the Fox, Rosie the Deer and some hungry otters.

5.title: England: Big Ben

episode of.title: Are We There Yet?: World Adventure (TV Series 2007– )

5.plot: Rosie and Julian solve some tricky mysteries in London, where they discover double-decker buses, find out what makes Big Ben tick and ride the London Eye.

6.title: England: Garden Maze

episode of.title: Are We There Yet?: World Adventure (TV Series 2007– )

6.plot: Rosie and Julian get happily lost in an English garden when they meet a maze expert who shows them the ins and outs of mazes made of wood, hedges and even water.

7.title: France: Medieval Fair

episode of.title: Are We There Yet?: World Adventure (TV Series 2007– )

7.plot: Julian and Rosie travel back in time when they dress-up for a Medieval Fair at a castle in France. They see jugglers, try jousting, make candles and learn about the olden days.

8.title: France: Amusement Park

episode of.title: Are We There Yet?: World Adventure (TV Series 2007– )

8.plot: As they explore a park in Paris, Rosie and Julian have fun playing petanque, feeding the goats and watching a famous French puppet show. C'est bon.

9.title: France: Eiffel Tower

episode of.title: Are We There Yet?: World Adventure (TV Series 2007– )

9.plot: Julian and Rosie go sightseeing in Paris where they sketch with a French artist, taste crêpes for the first time and finish their adventure atop the Eiffel Tower.

10.title: Canada: Halloween, Montreal

episode of.title: Are We There Yet?: World Adventure (TV Series 2007– )

10.plot: Sam and Molly celebrate Halloween in Montreal by exploring a scary bat-cave, carving crazy pumpkins and dressing up to go trick-or-treating.

11.title: Canada: Polar Bear Spotting

episode of.title: Are We There Yet?: World Adventure (TV Series 2007– )

11.plot: In snowy northern Manitoba, Molly and Sam go for a fun, bumpy ride in a giant tundra buggy and come face to face with a curious polar bear.

12.title: Canada: Dog Sledding

episode of.title: Are We There Yet?: World Adventure (TV Series 2007– )

12.plot: Molly and Sam have a snowy adventure in Manitoba when they go dog-sledding! They meet husky puppies, learn to drive a team of dogs and enjoy a tasty snack of bannock.

13.title: Ukraine: Easter Eggs

episode of.title: Are We There Yet?: World Adventure (TV Series 2007– )

13.plot: Molly and Sam explore the streets of Kiev where they ride a cable-driven funicular railway, go to an artists' market and craft traditional Ukrainian Easter Eggs.

14.title: Ukraine: Danging and Puppets

episode of.title: Are We There Yet?: World Adventure (TV Series 2007– )

14.plot: When Molly and Sam visit Kiev they dress up in colorful costumes for traditional dancing and later put on their very own puppet show.

15.title: Canada: Al Gonquin Aanimal Rescue

episode of.title: Are We There Yet?: World Adventure (TV Series 2007– )

15.plot: Molly and Sam fly to Algonquin Park on a seaplane. Then they visit an animal rescue centre to meet baby raccoons, play with a newborn beaver and free The Three Bears.

16.title: Germany: Downhill Skiing

episode of.title: Are We There Yet?: World Adventure (TV Series 2007– )

16.plot: Julian and Rosie take a cable car to the top of Germany's highest mountain where they learn to ski, meet a friendly dog and taste delicious apple strudel.

17.title: Germany: Christmas Market

episode of.title: Are We There Yet?: World Adventure (TV Series 2007– )

17.plot: On a visit to Munich, Rosie and Julian try candied apples at a Christmas market, where they find out what a glockenspiel is and sample some traditional German food.

18.title: Germany: Fairytale Castle

episode of.title: Are We There Yet?: World Adventure (TV Series 2007– )

18.plot: Julian and Rosie take a magical journey in a horse drawn carriage as they travel past fairytale castles. They end the day by building and eating their own gingerbread house.

19.title: U.S.A.: United Nations

episode of.title: Are We There Yet?: World Adventure (TV Series 2007– )

19.plot: Julian and Rosie go sightseeing in New York City. They tour the United Nations, take a ferry to the Statue of Liberty and enjoy pizza at Lombardi's, America's first pizzeria.

20.title: Kenya: Rhino

episode of.title: Are We There Yet?: World Adventure (TV Series 2007– )

20.plot: On a Kenyan safari, Julian and Rosie climb into a big Jeep and go to a giant park to see endangered black rhinos. They feed a baby, then meet some teen and adult rhinos.

21.title: Kenya: Samburu Tribe

episode of.title: Are We There Yet?: World Adventure (TV Series 2007– )

21.plot: Rosie and Julian visit a Samburu village where they find out what it's like to sleep in a mud hut, learn the tribal art of beading and dance a traditional tribal dance.

22.title: Kenya: Unicef School

episode of.title: Are We There Yet?: World Adventure (TV Series 2007– )

22.plot: Rosie and Julian raise the flag at a UNICEF school in Kenya. They play outside with the other kids and then head indoors to go to art class and give out gifts.

23.title: Kenya: Elephants

episode of.title: Are We There Yet?: World Adventure (TV Series 2007– )

23.plot: Rosie and Julian go to an elephant rescue centre in Kenya where they play with a team of soccer-playing baby elephants who are waiting to be released back into the wild.

24.title: Kenya: Giraffes

episode of.title: Are We There Yet?: World Adventure (TV Series 2007– )

24.plot: Rosie and Julian visit a giraffe centre where they feed the tallest animals on earth. They even climb a tower to see eye-to-eye with their spotty, long-necked new friends.

25.title: Peru: Land of the Llamas

episode of.title: Are We There Yet?: World Adventure (TV Series 2007– )

25.plot: Rosie and Julian learn about llamas as they feed, ride and spin thread from the wool of their shaggy new friends.

26.title: Peru: Festival

episode of.title: Are We There Yet?: World Adventure (TV Series 2007– )

26.plot: At a traditional festival in Peru, Rosie and Julian join in all the fun as they make their own masks, show off their dance moves, see a parade and finish the night with fireworks.

27.title: Peru: Machu Picchu

episode of.title: Are We There Yet?: World Adventure (TV Series 2007– )

27.plot: Rosie and Julian take a plane, a bus, a train and then climb a mountain to find a bird's-eye view of the lost city of Machu Picchu.

28.title: Costa Rica: Animal Rescue

episode of.title: Are We There Yet?: World Adventure (TV Series 2007– )

28.plot: At an animal rescue centre in Costa Rica, Sam and Molly meet Benjamin the kinkajou, search for caimans, cuddle with a baby howler monkey, then set free rescued birds.

29.title: Costa Rica: Zip Line

episode of.title: Are We There Yet?: World Adventure (TV Series 2007– )

29.plot: Molly and Sam have a healthy breakfast of fresh fruit to prepare them for an exciting day of zip-lining through the rainforest canopy (they meet a sloth too, who doesn't zip at all).

30.title: Costa Rica: Rafting

episode of.title: Are We There Yet?: World Adventure (TV Series 2007– )

30.plot: Sam and Molly find wet ways to stay cool in Costa Rica with a cannonball contest at the pool and then thrills (but no spills) whitewater rafting on fast moving rapids.

31.title: India: Taj Mahal

episode of.title: Are We There Yet?: World Adventure (TV Series 2007– )

31.plot: Rosie and Julian journey to one of the wonders of the world - the Taj Mahal! Along the way they go for a camel ride and explore an exciting Indian marketplace.

32.title: India: Safari

episode of.title: Are We There Yet?: World Adventure (TV Series 2007– )

32.plot: Rosie and Julian explore Corbett National Park and have the ride of their lives on an elephant. They see lots of animals - tigers, monkeys and wild boars, oh my.

33.title: India: Holi

episode of.title: Are We There Yet?: World Adventure (TV Series 2007– )

33.plot: Julian and Rosie take a long flight to India where they visit the Lotus Blossom Temple (in their socks) then cover each other in colour and do a dance for the festival of Holi.

34.title: Thailand: Bangkok

episode of.title: Are We There Yet?: World Adventure (TV Series 2007– )

34.plot: One day in Bangkok Molly and Sam ring bells for good luck at a temple, have fun painting umbrellas and feed some jumpy fish on a river boat adventure.

35.title: Thailand: Songkran

episode of.title: Are We There Yet?: World Adventure (TV Series 2007– )

35.plot: Sam and Molly have a soaking good time celebrating Songkran, the Thai New Year. They give food to monks, release animals in a traditional good luck offering and explore ancient ruins on an elephant.

36.title: Thailand: Tigers

episode of.title: Are We There Yet?: World Adventure (TV Series 2007– )

36.plot: Molly and Sam take a bamboo raft up the river to visit a secluded temple where monks raise orphaned tigers. Then they go swimming and see millions of flapping bats.

37.title: U.S.A.: Old West

episode of.title: Are We There Yet?: World Adventure (TV Series 2007– )

37.plot: Julian and Rosie go panning for gold in Montana, where they drive a steam train, ride a horse drawn stagecoach and have a showdown in a spooky ghost town.

38.title: U.S.A.: New York Museum

episode of.title: Are We There Yet?: World Adventure (TV Series 2007– )

38.plot: In the giant city of New York, Rosie and Julian see gigantic dinosaurs at the Natural History Museum and have great time skating in Central Park.

39.title: Canada: Canada Day

episode of.title: Are We There Yet?: World Adventure (TV Series 2007– )

39.plot: Molly and Sam celebrate Canada Day in Ottawa. There, they meet a Mountie and her horse, learn how to build a teepee, watch an air show and see some fireworks.

87.title: Hawaii: Surfing

episode of.title: Are We There Yet?: World Adventure (TV Series 2007– )

87.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

1.title: U.S.A.: Volcano

episode of.title: Are We There Yet?: World Adventure (TV Series 2007– )

1.plot: Rosie and Julian explore a simmering volcano park in Hawaii. They use a special thermometer to take a volcano's temperature and go for a helicopter ride to look down into its crater.

2.title: U.S.A.: Submarine

episode of.title: Are We There Yet?: World Adventure (TV Series 2007– )

2.plot: Rosie and Julian jump into some Hawaiian fun by going snorkeling at the beach; then it's off to the aquarium to meet octopuses and sharks. They end their day with an underwater adventure on a mini-submarine tour of the ocean depths.

3.title: U.S.A.: Surfing

episode of.title: Are We There Yet?: World Adventure (TV Series 2007– )

3.plot: Rosie and Julian journey the land of hula dancing and surfing - Hawaii! They learn to surf, make lei necklaces and then put on grass skirts for a hula dance with local kids.

4.title: Sweden: Vasa Museum

episode of.title: Are We There Yet?: World Adventure (TV Series 2007– )

4.plot: When Molly and Sam visit Stockholm, they take a floating taxi to a museum for a sunken ship, the 400-year-old Vasa! They explore the Vasa's ghostly wreck and finish their adventure with a thrilling ride on a Viking ship in an amusement park!

5.title: Sweden: Seals

episode of.title: Are We There Yet?: World Adventure (TV Series 2007– )

5.plot: Molly and Sam step back in time when they visit an open-air museum in Sweden. They dress in old-fashioned fashions, play old Swedish games and travel by carriage to feed goats, baby moose and hungry seals.

6.title: Sweden: Sailboat Race

episode of.title: Are We There Yet?: World Adventure (TV Series 2007– )

6.plot: Molly and Sam dance, ride and roller-coast their way through a carnival at the Baltic festival. Then they race a sailboat in the annual "Pea Soup Race" and sail their way to third place! Our intrepid sailors finish their day with traditional pea soup and a parade.

7.title: Sweden: Troubadour

episode of.title: Are We There Yet?: World Adventure (TV Series 2007– )

7.plot: In Stockholm, Molly and Sam meet their Troubadour friend at the Pippy Longstocking Museum. They watch a play based on the famous story and explore Pippy's house! After a quick break for pancakes the musical trio sings for free candy at the local candy store.

8.title: Iceland: Vikings

episode of.title: Are We There Yet?: World Adventure (TV Series 2007– )

8.plot: Sam and Molly journey to Iceland and learn all about Vikings. On their adventure, they explore a model of an old Viking ship and visit a Viking village where they dress in traditional Viking clothing and play Viking games.

9.title: Iceland: Natural Wonders

episode of.title: Are We There Yet?: World Adventure (TV Series 2007– )

9.plot: While exploring Iceland, Sam and Molly discover glaciers, waterfalls and volcanoes. They visit a steam power plant, build rock statues out of lava rocks, take a warm swim in the Blue Lagoon and come across exploding geysers.

10.title: Iceland: Puffins

episode of.title: Are We There Yet?: World Adventure (TV Series 2007– )

10.plot: Sam and Molly journey to the Westmann Islands just off the coast of Iceland, where they take an exciting bus ride to the top of a volcano. They discover a cave filled with millions of puffins and end the day with a fishing expedition.

11.title: Italy: Sculptures

episode of.title: Are We There Yet?: World Adventure (TV Series 2007– )

11.plot: Julian and Rosie discover all of Rome's beautiful history when a local sculptor helps them take casts of the city's ancient cobblestone streets. Then they meet a woodcarver named Gepetto and carve their very own Pinocchio puppets. Finally our daring adventurers ride off into the Italian sunset on a 4-wheeled bike.

12.title: Italy: Gladiators

episode of.title: Are We There Yet?: World Adventure (TV Series 2007– )

12.plot: Julian and Rosie learn all about ancient gladiators when they visit the city of Rome. They visit temple ruins, the Roman Forum and the 2000-year old Coliseum. After the tour, they go to a gladiator school and train to be pretend-gladiators!

13.title: Italy: Leaning Tower

episode of.title: Are We There Yet?: World Adventure (TV Series 2007– )

13.plot: On their way to visit the famous Leaning Tower of Pisa, Julian and Rosie stop off at an Italian market and later hear their own voices in a super echoey Baptistry. Then, after a quick go-kart race, they climb all 300 steps to the Leaning Tower's tilted top!

14.title: Italy: Soccer

episode of.title: Are We There Yet?: World Adventure (TV Series 2007– )

14.plot: Julian and Rosie journey to Milan to learn all about soccer. After joining a local kids practice, the siblings meet Italian soccer star Gennaro "Rino" Gattuso. He teaches them football tips and then invites them to watch his team AC Milan play at the stadium.

15.title: Italy: Gondola

episode of.title: Are We There Yet?: World Adventure (TV Series 2007– )

15.plot: Julian and Rosie tour the city of Venice on a gondola! They learn how to be gondoliers and enjoy a tasty treat of gelato. The day ends with feathery thrills as Rosie tries to escape from hundreds of adoring pigeons in famous St. Mark's Square.

16.title: Canada: Water Falls

episode of.title: Are We There Yet?: World Adventure (TV Series 2007– )

16.plot: TJ and Tristan travel to Niagara Falls to see the world famous water falls. The boys get soaking wet as they go under the falls in a boat; over the falls in a helicopter and even behind the falls in a maze of misty tunnels.

17.title: Turkey: Sugar Festival

episode of.title: Are We There Yet?: World Adventure (TV Series 2007– )

17.plot: TJ and Tristan fly to Istanbul on their very first plane ride. There, they celebrate "Seker Bayrami" or Festival of Sugar and go door-to-door and asking for candy. They spend the rest of their day eating lots of candy, watching drummers, jugglers and a parade!

18.title: Turkey: Blue Mosque

episode of.title: Are We There Yet?: World Adventure (TV Series 2007– )

18.plot: TJ and Tristan take a plane ride to Istanbul and visit a big park full of tiny model buildings. After viewing a model of the famous Blue Mosque, the boys take a boat ride to see the real thing. There, they climb to the top where they can see all of Istanbul!

19.title: Turkey: Turkish Bath

episode of.title: Are We There Yet?: World Adventure (TV Series 2007– )

19.plot: On a visit to Istanbul, Tristan and TJ visit a traditional Turkish bath. Then it's off to a special bakery where they learn to make the famous Turkish dessert of baklava. The boys end their adventure by spinning 'round and 'round with Whirling Dervishes!

20.title: Turkey: Hot Air Balloon

episode of.title: Are We There Yet?: World Adventure (TV Series 2007– )

20.plot: TJ and Tristan ride a hot air balloon over of the cave cities of Cappadocia. They camelback ride to explore the Fairy Chimneys and create pottery spaceships in a cave.

21.title: Egypt: Mummies

episode of.title: Are We There Yet?: World Adventure (TV Series 2007– )

21.plot: Joanna and Julia take a long plane ride to Cairo. They visit a museum full of mummies including the famous King Tut. Then they explore a bazaar where the girls search for ingredients to make their very own mummies with plush cats.

22.title: Egypt: Pyramids

episode of.title: Are We There Yet?: World Adventure (TV Series 2007– )

22.plot: Joanna and Julia journey to Egypt to see the world famous pyramids and Great Sphinx. On their adventure, they ride camels, participate in a dig, read hieroglyphics and explore the inside of a pyramid.

23.title: Egypt: Nile River

episode of.title: Are We There Yet?: World Adventure (TV Series 2007– )

23.plot: Joanna and Julia ride a Felucca boat down the Nile River. On the way they stop at a village market and make necklaces. After a paddleboat race with local children the girls ride camels to a desert campfire with their new friends.

24.title: Egypt: Animals

episode of.title: Are We There Yet?: World Adventure (TV Series 2007– )

24.plot: Joanna and Julia explore an ancient tomb in Cairo. They learn how to write their names in hieroglyphics and make paper out of papyrus reeds. An Egyptian snake charmer soon appears and does a dance with his cobra.

25.title: Russia: Winter

episode of.title: Are We There Yet?: World Adventure (TV Series 2007– )

25.plot: It's an exciting winter day for Tristan and TJ in Moscow. First they go tobogganing with friends in the snow, then they visit Red Square, St. Basil's Cathedral and the Kremlin. The boys end their day ice-skating with their new friends.

26.title: Russia: Father Frost

episode of.title: Are We There Yet?: World Adventure (TV Series 2007– )

26.plot: At a St. Petersburg toy market TJ and Tristan meet a figure from Russian folklore - Grandfather Frost! After a carriage ride to a doll shop they paint their own Matryoshka nesting dolls and then a troupe of Cossack dancers teach the boys how to high step.

27.title: Russia: Ballet

episode of.title: Are We There Yet?: World Adventure (TV Series 2007– )

27.plot: Tristan and TJ take a plane to St. Petersburg where they skate on a giant ice rink and meet a friend at the famous Mariinsky Theatre. At the theatre, they join the troupe for a dance lesson and then watch a live performance of the Nutcracker!

28.title: New Zealand: Maori

episode of.title: Are We There Yet?: World Adventure (TV Series 2007– )

28.plot: TJ and Tristan visit a village where they learn to stick their tongues out and yell a traditional Maori greeting. They end their adventure by learning and participating in the Haka Warrior dance.

29.title: New Zealand: Kiwi

episode of.title: Are We There Yet?: World Adventure (TV Series 2007– )

29.plot: TJ and Tristan visit a kiwi-fruit farm in New Zealand where they gather all the ingredients to make a yummy dessert called pavlova. After dessert, the boys visit a bird park and meet the Kiwi bird itself.

30.title: New Zealand: Glowworms

episode of.title: Are We There Yet?: World Adventure (TV Series 2007– )

30.plot: TJ and Tristan go spelunking in New Zealand! They take a boat ride through the dark caves and see glowworms light up like stars in the sky. Then they make friends with some slithery eels who wriggle through their fingers.

31.title: New Zealand: Boats

episode of.title: Are We There Yet?: World Adventure (TV Series 2007– )

31.plot: TJ and Tristan have a fun day celebrating Auckland's birthday (and TJ's). They mark the occasion by learning to sail, being captains in a tug boat race and watching an air show.

32.title: China: Pandas

episode of.title: Are We There Yet?: World Adventure (TV Series 2007– )

32.plot: Julia and Joanna visit a breeding centre for pandas way up in the foggy mountains of Chengdu. They feed the pandas bamboo leaves and then make bread for them as a special treat. There is plenty of panda patting and panda cuddling throughout.

33.title: China: Great Wall

episode of.title: Are We There Yet?: World Adventure (TV Series 2007– )

33.plot: Julia and Joanna visit the most famous monument in China- The Great Wall! Along the way, they take a cable ride up to the wall, make a beautiful mosaic out of stones and ride a long, shiny, twisty slide down to the bottom of the hill.

34.title: China: Opera

episode of.title: Are We There Yet?: World Adventure (TV Series 2007– )

34.plot: It's a jam-packed day in Beijing for Julia and Joanna. They explore Tiannamen Square and the Forbidden City; they make and fly their own kites and finally, they dress up like Chinese opera singers and perform at the hundred year old Huguang Guild Hall theatre.

35.title: China: New Years

episode of.title: Are We There Yet?: World Adventure (TV Series 2007– )

35.plot: Julia and Joanna journey to Beijing to celebrate New Years! During the festivities, the girls play carnival games, watch lion dancers, make lanterns and even ice bicycle on a frozen pond! They finish the night by watching an amazing fireworks display!

36.title: Canada: Winterlude

episode of.title: Are We There Yet?: World Adventure (TV Series 2007– )

36.plot: Joanna and Julia head to Canada's capital for a Winter Festival. Together, the duo explore gigantic ice sculptures, wiggle their way through a ice maze and slide down an enormous ice slide. The girls cap their day with their very first ice skating lesson!

37.title: Canada: Ice Fun

episode of.title: Are We There Yet?: World Adventure (TV Series 2007– )

37.plot: In Quebec City, Joanna and Julia visit a hotel made completely out of ice and snow. They make an ice sculpture of a fish and go ice fishing too! The girls end their snowy adventure by going on ice rides.

38.title: Canada: Maple Syrup

episode of.title: Are We There Yet?: World Adventure (TV Series 2007– )

38.plot: Tristan and TJ explore a maple syrup festival in Elmira. They make fresh taffy, try their hand at log sawing and eat lots of pancakes. They then take a tractor wagon to a sugar bush where they learn how maple syrup is made.

39.title: Canada: Stampede

episode of.title: Are We There Yet?: World Adventure (TV Series 2007– )

39.plot: Ye-Haw! Joanna and Julia visit Canada to experience the largest outdoor festival in the world - The Calgary Stampede. The girls enjoy some amusement rides, try riding a horse, watch a rodeo and dance in an aboriginal Pow-Wow. Before they leave, Joanna and Julia enjoy a huge fireworks show!

imdb.title: Are We There Yet?: World Adventure
akas: Are We There Yet?: World Adventure (Canada)

production companies.name: Bell Broadcast and New Media Fund

plot: An adventure travel series that takes kids on an unscripted journey to countries around the world.::Anonymous
